name: street-list
description: Get a list of German streets by postcode

scripts.zip: tar cfz street-list.tar.gz build/* package.json package-lock.json README.md icon.png
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run transpile && npm run lint && npm run zip
scripts.copy-assets: xcopy src\assets\ build\assets\ /E /I /Y && for /R "src\assets" %f in (*.json) do @xcopy "%f" "build\assets\" /I /Y

author: Cognigy GmbH
